layouts.layout: Formato Entregable Gestión Técnica de Proyecto

validationRules.errorMessage: Must send to approved to change status
validationRules.name: Cambio_de_Estado

validationRules.errorMessage: The status has changed to Signed, update the actual date of the signing.
validationRules.name: Estado_cambia_a_Firmado

validationRules.errorMessage: The status has changed to Released, update the Actual Release Date.
validationRules.name: Estado_cambia_a_Liberado

validationRules.errorMessage: Only the Technical Project Management profile can change the Contract End Date.
validationRules.name: Fecha_Fin_Contractual

validationRules.errorMessage: You can not change the date of the first Release.
validationRules.name: Fecha_Primera_Liberacion

validationRules.errorMessage: The actual signing date cannot be later than the current day
validationRules.name: Fecha_real_firma_menor_igual_hoy

validationRules.errorMessage: The actual release date cannot be later than the current day
validationRules.name: Fecha_real_liberacion_menor_igual_hoy

validationRules.errorMessage: You can not move the subdeliverable to delivered. You must be the approver of the sub-deliverable, responsible for the deliverable, or submit the sub-deliverable for approval.
validationRules.name: Pasar_a_Entregado

validationRules.errorMessage: The customer manager you have selected does not belong to the Contacts of the account related to the deliverable.
validationRules.name: Responsable_Cliente

validationRules.errorMessage: The fields: Level 1 Responsible, Level 2 Responsible, Level 1 Approver and Final Level Approver must be informed for their correct processing.
validationRules.name: Responsables_Informados
